players(String[]) - Static method in class extra.Protocol
[EXT CHALLENGE][SERVER] The response to a request for a list of players, containing a list of usernames of players on the server that also support the challenge extension.

https://gitlab.com/arthurrump/ringgz.protocol This class contains constants for all keywords/commands used in the protocol and static methods to create all commands with their arguments.
